analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/24/0xb8986a6c330deb52557b83556b57ed3a51de8a51.sol:
	Contract IEtherToken has payable functions:
	 - deposit (/unique_chucks/24/0xb8986a6c330deb52557b83556b57ed3a51de8a51.sol#439-440)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in BancorConverter.buy (/unique_chucks/24/0xb8986a6c330deb52557b83556b57ed3a51de8a51.sol#1111-1141):
	External calls:
	- amount = getPurchaseReturn(_connectorToken,_depositAmount) (/unique_chucks/24/0xb8986a6c330deb52557b83556b57ed3a51de8a51.sol#1114)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- connectors (/unique_chucks/24/0xb8986a6c330deb52557b83556b57ed3a51de8a51.sol#1123)

Reentrancy in BancorConverter.convert (/unique_chucks/24/0xb8986a6c330deb52557b83556b57ed3a51de8a51.sol#1089-1102):
	External calls:
	- purchaseAmount = buy(_fromToken,_amount,1) (/unique_chucks/24/0xb8986a6c330deb52557b83556b57ed3a51de8a51.sol#1101-1102)
	- sell(_toToken,purchaseAmount,_minReturn) (/unique_chucks/24/0xb8986a6c330deb52557b83556b57ed3a51de8a51.sol#1102)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- connectors (/unique_chucks/24/0xb8986a6c330deb52557b83556b57ed3a51de8a51.sol#1102)

Reentrancy in BancorConverter.sell (/unique_chucks/24/0xb8986a6c330deb52557b83556b57ed3a51de8a51.sol#1149-1186):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_sellAmount <= token.balanceOf(msg.sender)) (/unique_chucks/24/0xb8986a6c330deb52557b83556b57ed3a51de8a51.sol#1152-1153)
	- amount = getSaleReturn(_connectorToken,_sellAmount) (/unique_chucks/24/0xb8986a6c330deb52557b83556b57ed3a51de8a51.sol#1155)
	- tokenSupply = token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/24/0xb8986a6c330deb52557b83556b57ed3a51de8a51.sol#1158)
	- connectorBalance = getConnectorBalance(_connectorToken) (/unique_chucks/24/0xb8986a6c330deb52557b83556b57ed3a51de8a51.sol#1158-1159)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- connectors (/unique_chucks/24/0xb8986a6c330deb52557b83556b57ed3a51de8a51.sol#1166-1168)

BancorQuickConverter.convertFor has external calls inside a loop:
	- converter = ITokenConverter(smartToken.owner()) (/unique_chucks/24/0xb8986a6c330deb52557b83556b57ed3a51de8a51.sol#525-528)

BancorQuickConverter.convertFor has external calls inside a loop:
	- _amount = converter.change(fromToken,toToken,_amount,_minReturn) (/unique_chucks/24/0xb8986a6c330deb52557b83556b57ed3a51de8a51.sol#536-540)

BancorQuickConverter.convertFor has external calls inside a loop:
	- _amount = converter.change(fromToken,toToken,_amount,1) (/unique_chucks/24/0xb8986a6c330deb52557b83556b57ed3a51de8a51.sol#536-540)
